Improved Aspect of the Monkey.name: Improved Aspect of the Monkey
descriptions: Increases the dodge and melee Crit bonuses of Aspect of the Monkey by 1%.
Increases the dodge and melee Crit bonuses of Aspect of the Monkey by 2%.
Increases the dodge and melee Crit bonuses of Aspect of the Monkey by 3%.

Improved Aspect of the Hawk.name: Improved Aspect of the Hawk
descriptions: While Aspect of the Hawk is active, gives you a 10% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by 30% for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike with a ranged attack.
While Aspect of the Hawk is active, gives you a 20% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by 30% for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike with a ranged attack.
While Aspect of the Hawk is active, gives you a 30% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by 30% for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike with a ranged attack.
While Aspect of the Hawk is active, gives you a 40% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by 30% for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike with a ranged attack.
While Aspect of the Hawk is active, gives you a 50% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by 30% for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike with a ranged attack.

Endurance Training.name: Endurance Training
descriptions: Increases the Health of your pets by 10%.
Increases the Health of your pets by 20%.

Thick Hide.name: Thick Hide
descriptions: Increases the Armor rating of your pets by 15%.
Increases the Armor rating of your pets by 30%.
Increases the Armor rating of your pets by 45%.

Improved Mend Pet.name: Improved Mend Pet
descriptions: Gives the Mend Pet spell a 15% chance of restoring 50 Focus and removing 1 Curse, Disease, Magic, Poison or Fear effect from the pet each tick.
Gives the Mend Pet spell a 30% chance of restoring 50 Focus and removing 1 Curse, Disease, Magic, Poison or Fear effect from the pet each tick.

Aspect Mastery.name: Aspect Mastery
descriptions: Increases the effectiveness of your Aspect of the Beast, Aspect of the Cheetah, Aspect of the Pack and Aspect of the Wild by 25% and reduces the mana cost of all your Aspects by 50%.
Increases the effectiveness of your Aspect of the Beast, Aspect of the Cheetah, Aspect of the Pack and Aspect of the Wild by 50% and reduces the mana cost of all your Aspects by 100%.

Improved Revive Pet.name: Improved Revive Pet
descriptions: Revive Pet's casting time is reduced by 3 sec, mana cost is reduced by 50%, and increases the health your pet returns with by an additional 15%.
Revive Pet's casting time is reduced by 6 sec, mana cost is reduced by 100%, and increases the health your pet returns with by an additional 30%.

Intimidation.name: Intimidation
descriptions: Command your pet to intimidate the target on the next successful melee attack, causing a high amount of threat and stunning the target for 4 seconds.

Unleashed Fury.name: Unleashed Fury
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your pets by 2%.
Increases the damage done by your pets by 4%.
Increases the damage done by your pets by 6%.
Increases the damage done by your pets by 8%.
Increases the damage done by your pets by 10%.

Bestial Swiftness.name: Bestial Swiftness
descriptions: Increases the movement speed of your pets by 10% and their dodge chance by 5%.
Increases the movement speed of your pets by 20% and their dodge chance by 10%.
Increases the movement speed of your pets by 30% and their dodge chance by 15%.

Survival Instincts.name: Survival Instincts
descriptions: Reduces the chance your pets are critically hit by melee attacks by 2% and increases the chance your pets avoid area of effect spells by an additional 30%.
Reduces the chance your pets are critically hit by melee attacks by 4% and increases the chance your pets avoid area of effect spells by an additional 60%.
Reduces the chance your pets are critically hit by melee attacks by 6% and increases the chance your pets avoid area of effect spells by an additional 90%.

Bestial Discipline.name: Bestial Discipline
descriptions: Increases the Focus regeneration of your pets by 50%.
Increases the Focus regeneration of your pets by 100%.

Ferocity.name: Ferocity
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 3%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 6%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 9%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 12%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 15%.

Team Play.name: Team Play
descriptions:
Your attacks have a 10% chance to Invigorate your pet, instantly granting them 50 focus and freeing them from 1 Poison, Disease, Magic, Curse, or Fear effects

Your pet attacks have a chance to inspire you, reducing Mana cost of your next spell or ability by 100% for 5 seconds.

Your attacks have a 20% chance to Invigorate your pet, instantly granting them 50 focus and freeing them from 1 Poison, Disease, Magic, Curse, or Fear effects

Your pet attacks have a chance to inspire you, reducing Mana cost of your next spell or ability by 100% for 5 seconds. More effective than Team Play (Rank 1).

Bestial Wrath.name: Bestial Wrath
descriptions: Send your pet into a rage causing 20% additional damage for 30 seconds.  While enraged, the beast does not feel pity or remorse or fear and it cannot be stopped unless killed.

Savage Flurry.name: Savage Flurry
descriptions: Increases your and your pet's attack speed by 3%.
Increases your and your pet's attack speed by 6%.
Increases your and your pet's attack speed by 9%.
Increases your and your pet's attack speed by 12%.
Increases your and your pet's attack speed by 15%.

Spirit Bond.name: Spirit Bond
descriptions:
Your pet get Attack Power, bonus to Critical strike chance and Stamina equal to 6% of your Attack Power, Critical strike chance and Stamina.

While your pet is active, you will regenerate 1% of your total health every 10 sec.

Your pet get Attack Power, bonus to Critical strike chance and Stamina equal to 12% of your Attack Power, Critical strike chance and Stamina.

While your pet is active, you will regenerate 1% of your total health every 8 sec.

Your pet get Attack Power, bonus to Critical strike chance and Stamina equal to 18% of your Attack Power, Critical strike chance and Stamina.

While your pet is active, you will regenerate 1% of your total health every 6 sec.

Your pet get Attack Power, bonus to Critical strike chance and Stamina equal to 24% of your Attack Power, Critical strike chance and Stamina.

While your pet is active, you will regenerate 1% of your total health every 4 sec.

Your pet get Attack Power, bonus to Critical strike chance and Stamina equal to 30% of your Attack Power, Critical strike chance and Stamina.

While your pet is active, you will regenerate 1% of your total health every 2 sec.

Frenzy.name: Frenzy
descriptions: Gives your pet a 20% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for next 5 attacks or for 15 seconds after dealing a critical strike.
Gives your pet a 40% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for next 5 attacks or for 15 seconds after dealing a critical strike.
Gives your pet a 60% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for next 5 attacks or for 15 seconds after dealing a critical strike.
Gives your pet a 80% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for next 5 attacks or for 15 seconds after dealing a critical strike.
Gives your pet a 100% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for next 5 attacks or for 15 seconds after dealing a critical strike.

Kill Command.name: Kill Command
descriptions: Give the command to kill, increasing damage done by your pet by 50% for 5 seconds. Only usable against enemies that have 20% or less health.

Terrifying Roar.name: Terrifying Roar
descriptions: Roars at an enemy, paralyzing it with terror for 5 seconds. In addition, up to NaN total nearby enemies will flee in fear for 10 seconds.
